languages.text: "Это вы затеяли нечто опасное и безумное — вздумали хамить мне. Император свидетель, {name}, я совершенно не в настроении препираться с Вольным Торговцем. Даже с Вашей Очень Свежеиспеченной Светлостью".

"You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Это вы затеяли нечто опасное и безумное — вздумали хамить мне. Император свидетель, {name}, я совершенно не в настроении препираться с Вольным Торговцем. Даже с Вашей Очень Свежеиспеченной Светлостью".

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something dangerous and crazy — acting insolent towards me. Honest to Emperor, {name}, I am not in the mood for quarrelling with a Rogue Trader. Even with Your Very Fresh {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something dangerous and crazy — acting insolent towards me. Honest to Emperor, {name}, I am not in the mood for quarrelling with a Rogue Trader. Even with Your Very Fresh {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something dangerous and crazy, acting insolent toward me. Honest to Emperor, {name}, I am not in the mood for squabbling with a Rogue Trader. Even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something dangerous and crazy, acting insolent toward me. Honest to Emperor, {name}, I am not in the mood for squabbling with a Rogue Trader. Even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am not in the mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: « C'est vous qui jouez avec le feu en faisant preuve d'une telle insolence envers moi. L'Empereur m'en soit témoin, {name}, je ne suis pas d'humeur à me quereller avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, même s'il s'agit de Votre Seigneurie Nouvellement Intronisée. »
languages.original_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vous qui jouez avec le feu en faisant preuve d'une telle insolence envers moi. L'Empereur m'en soit témoin, {name}, je ne suis pas d'humeur à me quereller avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, même s'il s'agit de Votre Seigneurie Nouvellement Intronisée. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Es usted quien comete un acto peligroso y descabellado al dirigirse a mí con esta insolencia. Juro por el Emperador que no estoy de ánimo para discutir con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, {name}. Ni siquiera con su recién adquirida señoría».
languages.original_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted quien comete un acto peligroso y descabellado al dirigirse a mí con esta insolencia. Juro por el Emperador que no estoy de ánimo para discutir con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, {name}. Ni siquiera con su recién adquirida señoría».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “你做的事情才是真的很危险、很疯狂，因为你竟敢对我如此无礼。帝皇在上，{name}，我实在没心情和行商浪人争吵，哪怕是最近才刚刚即位的行商浪人也不例外。”
languages.original_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “你做的事情才是真的很危险、很疯狂，因为你竟敢对我如此无礼。我向帝皇发誓，{name}，我实在没心情和行商浪人争吵，哪怕是最近才刚刚即位的行商浪人也不例外。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ihr versucht hier doch etwas Gefährliches und Verrücktes, indem Ihr Euch mir gegenüber derart dreist aufführt. Beim Imperator, {name}, mir ist wirklich nicht danach, mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} zu zanken. Nicht einmal mit Euer frisch installierter {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr versucht hier doch etwas Gefährliches und Verrücktes, indem Ihr Euch mir gegenüber derart dreist aufführt. Beim Imperator, {name}, mir ist wirklich nicht danach, mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} zu zanken. Nicht einmal mit Euer kürzlich erst installierter {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「私に対して横暴な態度をとり、危険で狂ったことをしようとしているのは、あなただ。皇帝に誓うが、{name}、私は自由開拓者と口論する気分ではない。あなたが最近着任したばかりだったとしても」
languages.original_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「私に対して横暴な態度をとり、危険で狂ったことをしようとしているのは、あなただ。皇帝に誓うが、{name}、私は自由開拓者と口論する気分ではない。あなたが最近着任したばかりだったとしても」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Bana küstahlıkla yaklaşarak tehlikeli ve delice bir şey yapan sensin. İmparator aşkına {name}, hiç Hür Tacir'le tartışacak havamda değilim. Yeni Yerleşmiş {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle bile."
languages.original_text: "You are the one who is attempting something mad and dangerous by acting with insolence toward me. By the Emperor, {name}, I am in no mood to squabble with a Rogue Trader. Not even with Your Recently Installed {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
